author: Ganesh Ramachandran
author_info: Supply Chain Consultant - Thoucentric || Ex - GEP
content:
I am super stoked to share that I have joined Thoucentric in their Supply Chain Practice as a Consultant! Looking forward to some great deal of learning with them.

Thoucentric is a niche management consulting firm that leverages People, Processes & Technology to solve complex business problems across various industries. Ever since its establishment in 2015, it has only grown from strength to strength. And it's indeed a great delight to serve such a rapidly growing and ever-expanding organization.

Using this platform to thank Nidhi Srivastava for a smooth onboarding experience and Manish Garg for the opportunity! Special thanks to Jude Jegan for making this happen.

#supplychain #managementconsulting #Thoucentric

author: Delaram Baghoori
content:
Work hard, dream big, and never give up!
 
About five years ago, I started my journey as an international student seeking exciting adventures, learning new skills along facing all challenges ahead. 
 
Despite all the ups and downs, I kept pushing myself further and moving forward. After completing my master's in Rehabilitation Sciences under the supervision of my amazing and supportive professor, Dr. Shu-Ping Chen, at the University of Alberta Faculty of Rehabilitation Medicine, I successfully passed the equivalency assessment process for internationally educated OTs (SEAS) and became a provisional registered OT in British Columbia province. 
 
Now I am thrilled to announce that as of January 2022, I started the next chapter of my journey by joining Salius Rehab Inc. as a Provisional Occupational Therapist. Special thanks to Sonia Singla and Julia Pereira who provided me with this opportunity to join their awesome professional team, learn, and grow!
